feed.title: DevX
feed.subtitle: We study how humans interact with code and design new ways to build software. I work at the intersection of software engineering and human-computer interaction.

entry.title: Papers to appear at VL/HCC 2020
entry.content: Our papers on Using hypotheses as a debugging aid and Find unique usages: helping developers understand common usages will appear at VL/HCC 2020.
entry.summary: Our papers on Using hypotheses as a debugging aid and Find unique usages: helping developers understand common usages will appear at VL/HCC 2020.

entry.title: Paper to appear at ESE 2020
entry.content: Our paper on Explicit Programming Strategies will appear in Empirical Software Engineering.
entry.summary: Our paper on Explicit Programming Strategies will appear in Empirical Software Engineering.

entry.title: We won PatriotHacks 2019
entry.content: Emad, Abdulaziz and Sahar participated in PatriotHacks and won the first place in Informed XP challenge! More details here
entry.summary: Emad, Abdulaziz and Sahar participated in PatriotHacks and won the first place in Informed XP challenge! More details here

entry.title: Papers at VL/HCC 2019
entry.content: Our papers on Active Documentation, Mixed Human-AI Authoring of Code Patterns, and An Exploratory Study of Live-Streamed Programming appeared at VL/HCC 2019.
entry.summary: Our papers on Active Documentation, Mixed Human-AI Authoring of Code Patterns, and An Exploratory Study of Live-Streamed Programming appeared at VL/HCC 2019.

entry.title: Honorable mention at VL/HCC 2019
entry.content: Our paper on Mixed Human-AI Authoring of Code Patterns received a Best Paper Honorable Mention Award at VL/HCC 2019.
entry.summary: Our paper on Mixed Human-AI Authoring of Code Patterns received a Best Paper Honorable Mention Award at VL/HCC 2019.
